show.title: Divorced Single Mother
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा 
https://links.kukufm.com/thgeSc
show.description: This is the story of a single mother and her three exceptionally talented sons. Each of her sons has now reached a stable and successful position — one is the president of a company, another is the head of a pharmacy division, and the third is the director of a research institute. One day, the mother returns to her maternal home (her childhood house) on the occasion of her mother's 70th birthday. There, she is met with humiliation, hostility, and favoritism. But… in search of peace and happiness, she begins to find her own path in life.

Each of her sons has now reached a stable and successful position — one is the president of a company, another is the head of a pharmacy division, and the third is the director of a research institute. One day, the mother returns to her maternal home (her childhood house) on the occasion of her mother's 70th birthday. There, she is met with humiliation, hostility, and favoritism.
